:is-up-to-date: True

.. _crafter-core-api-cache-clear:

=====
Clear
=====

Clear the cache scope for a given context.

--------------------
Resource Information
--------------------

.. include:: /includes/tomcat-api-url-prefix.rst

+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
|| HTTP Verb                 || GET                                                              |
+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
|| URL                       || ``/api/1/cache/clear``                                           |
+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
|| Response Formats          || ``JSON``                                                         |
+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+

----------
Parameters
----------

+-------------------------+-------------+---------------+--------------------------------------+
|| Name                   || Type       || Required     || Description                         |
+=========================+=============+===============+======================================+
|| contextId              || String     || |checkmark|  || The site context id                 |
+-------------------------+-------------+---------------+--------------------------------------+
|| token                  || String     || |checkmark|  || The authorization token             |
+-------------------------+-------------+---------------+--------------------------------------+

-------
Example
-------

^^^^^^^
Request
^^^^^^^

``GET .../api/1/cache/clear?contextId=405ffc233d075b010536bd2eb786b86c&token=defaultManagementToken``

^^^^^^^^
Response
^^^^^^^^

``Status 200 OK``

.. code-block:: json

  { "message": "Cache scope for context '405ffc233d075b010536bd2eb786b86c' has been cleared" }

---------
Responses
---------

+---------+--------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
|| Status || Location                      || Response Body                                      |
+=========+================================+=====================================================+
|| 200    ||                               || See example above.                                 |
+---------+--------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
|| 500    ||                               || ``{ "message" : "Internal server error" }``        |
+---------+--------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
